title: What are the grade points from this sem?
content:
Ik the grade points go like

100-90 S

89 - 80 A

79 - 70 B

69- 60 C  and so on.



But during the start of the sem(in the orientation) I heard Jawahar sir saying something about 11 marks difference between each grade point. So does it go like.

  
100 - 89 S

88 - 77 A

76 - 65 B

64 - 53 C and so on

  
I am cooked this sem

comments.body: Yes they told passing marks is 35 this timeÂ
Yes for sem 3... I don't know abt other sems
Is this true for first sem as well?

Are backlog exams conducted in June alongwith Summerterm backlog exams in July? 
Because there are no backlog exams in January.

Are there backlog exams in June? 
I know about July.
How many times can a student give backlog in one year?
I think 3 times.... June July and December.
bro's writing FAQs for his website.

there is only one exam in summer break, it will be either in june or july, and u can even give backlog exam during ur semester too, its better to clear it as soon as possible and make sure u clear it in 1 attempt.
Yes jawar told it in orientationÂ
Is this FR? I'm expecting in the border of 75-80 for most subjects and this is giving me so much hope, I thought i was screwed ðŸ˜­
